highlights.title: Highlights
items: Won first place in a programming competition in 2023.
Implemented a project management system, boosting efficiency by 30%.

items.description: Developed responsive web applications using React.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack online store with payment integration.
projects.details: Built with React, Node.js, and Stripe. Features user authentication, product filtering, and a responsive design.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: A productivity app for managing tasks and teams.
projects.details: Developed using Next.js and MongoDB. Includes real-time updates and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal resume website with multi-language support.
projects.details: Created with React, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js. Supports PDF generation and email functionality.
